title: How do I post a discussion?
body: Help & Support is the only board I am able to post in. How do a discussion in the other boards?

replies.body: May have just been a syncing issue with your account.  Your post here should have sync'd you, so you should be able to post now!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ncRgh0I7,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-22T22:18:30.816+0000)
>
> May have just been a syncing issue with your account.  Your post here should have sync'd you, so you should be able to post now!

Yes, that is actually what had happened, thank you
